amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit funds to be used by the Secretary of Homeland Security to develop a plan that permits travel into the United States from foreign countries using any document other than a passport.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 28 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit funds to be used by the Secretary of Homeland Security to develop a plan that permits travel into the United States from foreign countries using any document other than a passport.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Poe amendment (A041) Failed by recorded vote: 89 - 331 (Roll no. 482).
